content:
# The error indicates that the `extract_item` function does not accept a `target` keyword argument. This suggests that I need to provide the position of the Stone Furnace instead of the entity itself.

# To resolve this, I will first get the position of the Stone Furnace and then attempt to extract the remaining iron ore using that position.

# Let's retrieve the position of the Stone Furnace and try the extraction again.
stone_furnace_position = stone_furnace_entity.position  # Getting the position of the Stone Furnace
extract_item(Prototype.IronOre, position=stone_furnace_position, quantity=1)  # Attempting to extract one iron ore again.

# After the extraction, I will inspect the inventory of the Stone Furnace once more to see its current contents.
print(f"Inventory of the Stone Furnace after extraction: {inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)}")
